sentences.sentence: Don't just maunder about: do some work!
sentences.translation: 别光闲荡了，做点正经事吧！

sentences.sentence: Which was written by Almond and Maunder, so credits go there.
sentences.translation: 这是写的杏仁和蒙德，使信贷去那里。

sentences.sentence: Finally big thanks to Chris Maunder, author of a very light, simple and reliable grid.
sentences.translation: 最后，我要特别感谢克里·斯蒙德，一个很轻，简单和可靠的网格的作者。
